name: The Crossroads
description: Where two dirt roads intersect. A dead tree marks the center. Items hang from branchesâ€”offerings, messages, warnings. A place of transition and decision.
lighting_quality: Exposed but the tree creates one strong shadow that rotates with the sun.
temperature_range: Hot, no shelter. Tree is dead and provides minimal shade.
acoustic_quality: Open. Wind through dead branches creates clicking sounds. Objects hanging from tree chime softly.
objects_present: Dead tree with hanging objects (bottles, bones, cloth strips, keys)
Stone cairns at each road direction
Offerings at tree base (coins, flowers, bread)
architectural_features: Four roads extending in cardinal directions
atmosphere: Liminal and significant. A space of choices and messages.
